Title: Mylo Style Settings Modal Specification
Short Description: This specification defines the behavior, layout, and controls of the Style Settings modal, which lets users configure typography, lists, lines, and hyphenation. Tabs appear in the fixed order: Typography → Lists → Lines → Hyphenation. Hyphenation is least-used and can also be set globally in template settings.
